schema.title: AutoScaling configurations
schema.description: Describes the autoScaling configuration for a nodePool.

minNodes.description: Minimum number of nodes the cluster auto-scaler should scale down to.

maxNodes.description: Maximum number of nodes the cluster auto-scaler should scale up to.

enabled.description: Enable or disable the cluster auto-scaler addon.

tests.description: llama-70b generated negative; focus on minimum keyword
tests.rust_error: 0 is less than the minimum of 1
tests.python_error:
0 is less than the minimum of 1

Failed validating 'minimum' in schema['properties']['minNodes']:
    {'description': 'Minimum number of nodes the cluster auto-scaler '
                    'should scale down to.',
     'minimum': 1,
     'type': 'number'}

On instance['minNodes']:
    0

tests.rust_error: 1 is less than the minimum of 2
tests.python_error:
1 is less than the minimum of 2

Failed validating 'minimum' in schema['properties']['maxNodes']:
    {'description': 'Maximum number of nodes the cluster auto-scaler '
                    'should scale up to.',
     'minimum': 2,
     'type': 'number'}

On instance['maxNodes']:
